prompt: Analyze the last 7 days of posts in r/startups. Create a document 'Startup_Trends.md' in the 'General' folder comparing the number of posts about 'hiring' vs 'funding'. Report the document ID and the counts you found.
gold_response: I analyzed r/startups and found 1 post about hiring and 1 post about funding. I created 'Startup_Trends.md' (docID: doc...) with this comparison.

rubric.criteria: The agent must list or search posts in the 'startups' subreddit.
The agent must create a new document named 'Startup_Trends.md' using the docs tool.
The document must compare the number of posts related to 'hiring' vs 'funding' (based on seed data, there is 1 of each).
The agent must report the document ID of the created report.
